statements: SELECT * FROM regulatory_policies;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM regulatory_policies;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT regulatory_body, policy_name FROM regulatory_policies ORDER BY regulatory_body DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_policies WHERE implementation_date > '2022-01-01' AND regulatory_body LIKE '%FDA%';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_policies WHERE regulatory_body = 'FDA' ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM regulatory_policies WHERE implementation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY implementation_date ASC;
SELECT regulatory_body, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM regulatory_policies GROUP BY regulatory_body HAVING total_count > 1;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, YEAR(implementation_date) AS year FROM regulatory_policies WHERE YEAR(implementation_date) = 2022 ORDER BY policy_id;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, CHAR_LENGTH(policy_description) AS description_length FROM regulatory_policies WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(policy_description) > 100 ORDER BY description_length DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_changes;
SELECT policy_name, change_date FROM policy_changes ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT policy_name, change_description FROM policy_changes WHERE change_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_id, user_id, action_performed FROM policy_audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(id) AS avg_id FROM policy_changes GROUP BY policy_name;
SELECT * FROM policy_changes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, change_date FROM policy_changes WHERE change_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, policy_name, change_description FROM policy_changes WHERE policy_name LIKE '%approval%';
SELECT * FROM policy_audit_logs WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT policy_id FROM policy_audit_logs WHERE action_performed = 'update';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_policies;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, issue_date FROM regulatory_policies ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM regulatory_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_id, policy_description, issue_date FROM regulatory_policies WHERE issue_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, policy_description FROM regulatory_policies WHERE policy_name LIKE '%regulatory%';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM regulatory_policies WHERE policy_id > 3 ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT rp.*, rc.change_description FROM regulatory_policies rp JOIN regulatory_changes rc ON rp.policy_id = rc.policy_id WHERE rc.change_type = 'Amendment';

SELECT pc.history_date, pr.policy_name, rc.change_description FROM policy_history pc JOIN regulatory_policies pr ON pc.policy_id = pr.policy_id JOIN regulatory_changes rc ON pc.change_id = rc.change_id WHERE pr.policy_id = 2 AND rc.change_type = 'Update' ORDER BY pc.history_date DESC;
SELECT rp.*, ph.history_details FROM regulatory_policies rp LEFT JOIN policy_history ph ON rp.policy_id = ph.policy_id WHERE ph.change_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_policies;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM regulatory_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT change_id, change_type, change_date FROM policy_changes ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT commenter_name, comment_text, timestamp FROM policy_comments WHERE policy_id = 3;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, effective_date FROM regulatory_policies WHERE effective_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM regulatory_policies WHERE effective_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT p.policy_name, p.effective_date, c.change_type FROM regulatory_policies p JOIN policy_changes c ON p.policy_id = c.policy_id;
SELECT MAX(change_date) AS latest_change_date FROM policy_changes;
SELECT pc.commenter_name, pc.comment_text FROM policy_comments pc JOIN regulatory_policies rp ON pc.policy_id = rp.policy_id WHERE rp.policy_name LIKE '%security%';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_policies;
SELECT policy_name, effective_date FROM regulatory_policies WHERE id = 1;
SELECT agency_name, contact_person, contact_email FROM regulatory_agencies ORDER BY agency_name DESC;
SELECT policy_description FROM regulatory_policies WHERE effective_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM regulatory_policies WHERE last_updated >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_policies ORDER BY effective_date DESC;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM regulatory_policies WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE contact_person IS NULL;
SELECT policy_name, last_updated FROM regulatory_policies WHERE effective_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_name, policy_description, change_description FROM regulatory_policies INNER JOIN policy_changes ON regulatory_policies.id = policy_changes.policy_id ORDER BY change_date DESC;
